railroad.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The supplies were sent on the railroad.
railroad.translation[1].definitions[0].d: to force or persuade someone to do something without giving them enough time to think about it
railroad.translation[1].definitions[0].e: The workers were railroaded into signing the agreement.

railroad.translation[2].definitions[1].e: He had taken a job as a ticket agent on the railroad.
